signature: TransformedSortedMap<K, V> transformingSortedMap(SortedMap<K, V>, Transformer<? super K, ? extends K>, Transformer<? super V, ? extends V>)

enhanced_by.method_name: transformedMap(Map<K, V>, Transformer<? super K, ? extends K>, Transformer<? super V, ? extends V>)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve transforming a map with key and value transformers.
The transformMap method is used to transform the contents of a map, which is similar to the transformation logic in transformingSortedMap.
The put method may need to be tested in conjunction with transformingSortedMap to ensure that transformations are applied correctly when adding new entries.
The putAll method may need to be tested in conjunction with transformingSortedMap to ensure that transformations are applied correctly when adding multiple entries.
